title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the playoff action from yesterday. Who's DP rooting for? Legendary Broadcaster Bob Costas calls in to talk playoff baseball, and shares his opinion on Aaron Judge's 62 Homers. Plus, Former NFL Defensive End Marcellus Wiley joins to explain why he doesn't agree with defensive players complaining about roughing the passer rules.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the playoff action from yesterday. Who's DP rooting for? Legendary Broadcaster Bob Costas calls in to talk playoff baseball, and shares his opinion on Aaron Judge's 62 Homers. Plus, Former NFL Defensive End Marcellus Wiley joins to explain why he doesn't agree with defensive players complaining about roughing the passer rules.
